name: BOB-ble
description:
A small puzzle game i made 2 months ago and finally decided to finish it 

Welcome to Bobs bubble world, shoot your ball to teleport through obstacles, solve puzzles and go through the exit. Simple right? lol good luck

CONTROLS

WASDmove aroundmouse LEFT CLICKshoot ballmouse RIGHT CLICKteleport to your ballEplace teleporterQteleport to teleporterRrestart levelESCback to menu

TIP: your ball always bounces back to bob even if theres a wall blocking it and will bounce in every direction towards bob
